title: Grateful Dead Live at Hartford Civic Center on 1981-03-14
lineage: MAC > Nakamichi CR5A > Edirol FA-66 > Wavelab > R8Brain > CD-Wave > TLH > FLAC 1644 Tagged. Transfer by Andrew F. 09/2010
source: AUD: 3x Nakamichi CM300/CP4's shotguns > Nakamichi 550 > Maxell XLII-S 90's, set up in arena riser "all the way back" center, facing the stage. Taped by Tim Friend.
